name: Jackal

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The jackal has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.
